summary: adds a Ship (Playerhome) to the north of Dawnstar
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]DESCRIPTION:[/b][/u]
this mod was requested by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/843537-completely-vanilla-ship-in-skyrim/]Computermichael[/url].
This Mod adds a ship north of Dawnstar.
The player can use it as Playerhome.
The NPC\'s are still there but friendly, the Captain (Orc) can be used as follower or can be married.

Nothing was added to the interior (It\'s basicly a copy of Dainty Sload).

Current Version: 1.1


[u][b]FAQs:[/b][/u]
So far, no FAQs yet


[u][b]CHANGELOG:[/b][/u]
[b]Version 1.1:[/b]
* optimized navmesh
* added a small step on the ship, so NPCs can follow easily
* changed Captains\' Chest into non-resetting (So you can store your stuff there, without a reset)
* added non-resetting Chest for player (you can store stuff there)

[b]Version 1.0:[/b]
* initial Release
author: Dusa

files.name: Forgotten Ship 1_1
files.changelogHtml:
optimized navmesh
added a small step on the ship, so NPCs can follow easily
